DataElement.preferredName: Head and Neck Surgery Specific Complication Oral Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term that represents the kind of  oral complication specific to head and neck surgery.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Head and Neck Surgery Specified Complication Oral Cavity
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any surgery involving a structure in the head and neck region._Clearly and explicitly stated._Any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease, treatment, or procedure._The cavity located at the upper end of the alimentary canal, behind the teeth and gums that is bounded on the outside by the lips, above by the hard and soft palates and below by the tongue.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Head and Neck Surgery Specified Complication
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any surgery involving a structure in the head and neck region.:Clearly and explicitly stated.:Any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease, treatment, or procedure.

Concepts.definition: Any surgery involving a structure in the head and neck region.
Any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease, treatment, or procedure.

Property.preferredDefinition: The cavity located at the upper end of the alimentary canal, behind the teeth and gums that is bounded on the outside by the lips, above by the hard and soft palates and below by the tongue.

Concepts.definition: The cavity located at the upper end of the alimentary canal, behind the teeth and gums that is bounded on the outside by the lips, above by the hard and soft palates and below by the tongue.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results or effects (does not include CTC Adverse Events) of therapeutic agents or procedures administered to the patient.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret as requested by D.Laurence. mc 6/15/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The joint between the head of the lower mandible and the temporal bone.: A displacement of a part (especially a bone) from its normal position.

Concepts.definition: The joint between the head of the lower mandible and the temporal bone.
A displacement of a part (especially a bone) from its normal position.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.: Damage inflicted on the body as the direct or indirect result of an external force, with or without disruption of structural continuity.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to a tooth or teeth, or to odontology.
Damage inflicted on the body as the direct or indirect result of an external force, with or without disruption of structural continuity.
